[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_column_text]A Nerd’s World was hired to re-design the Official Wu Tang Clan website to celebrate their 20 year anniversary back in 2015.  It was with great pleasure to design, and build this new website from scratch.  As icing on the cake we made our way down to New York City to meet with the Wu at a website launch party.

Return to our Web Development Portfolio & Pricing[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
